Name: Classic Cocktail
Ingredients: 10 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist (& optional sugar rim).
Review: Reminiscent of a Sidecar with maraschino liqueur.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Harry Craddock 's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book .
Nutrition: One serving of Classic Cocktail contains 187 calories
